text:
Hi folks!
I'm Arcade Wise. I'm a teenager and I'm looking for a full-time job!
I have a ton of experience in Rust, C, Python, JavaScript, etc. and have done college-level research before I speak 3 languages fluently, and have lived in 3 different countries, on 2 continents, over the last 6 years.
I would prefer a smaller company, especially startups, and especially ones that offer relocation benefits. I prefer working in person, and am willing to move almost anywhere, but am also completely open to remote work.
Please check out my resumé: <https://arcades.agency/media/Arcade.pdf>
And my website: <https://arcades.agency>
